Types

ArchetypeStore[Comps] = object
Stores a specific archetype shape 
ArchRow[Comps] = object
  entityId*: EntityId
  components*: Comps
A row of data stored about an entity that matches a specific archetype 
NewArchSlot[Comps] = distinct Entry[ArchRow[Comps]]
